overview:
CEO and Co-Founder at PhotoMania.

PhotoMania is a social image-processing service, providing state-of-the-art photo effects and filters. PhotoMania was developed by Trionity, an energetic, young company with a creative and talented staff.

PhotoMania allows users to instantly turn their photos into exciting visual art with over 400 easy-to-use photo effects. PhotoMania was initially launched as a Facebook app. In 2012, PhotoMania reached over 34 million users, who created over 750 million photos. The app consistently ranks in Facebook “Top 20 Popular Entertainment Applications.”

PhotoMania is currently expanding its product to a broader social platform with wider sharing capabilities. PhotoMania will also be launching a mobile app and a corporate website in the near future.

Has a long track of excellence in major corporations such as Intel & Samsung.
